A Spanish judge has ordered a woman to either enter a relationship with a man or turn her children over to her former husband after the court was told the woman is a lesbian.
 
 Judge Fernando Ferrin Calamita said that having a lesbian mother would harm the children and "raised the risk" that the girls would also become gay the EFE news agency reported Monday.
 
 "It is understood that [a parent's] drug addiction, child abuse, prostitution, belonging to a satanic sect or heterosexual affair would negatively affect the children and serve as a reason for a change of custody. Well, it's the same with homosexuality," EFE quoted him as saying."
 
 Ferrin Calamita, who presides over family court in the eastern region of Murcia said he would allow the unnamed woman to keep the children only if she were in a heterosexual relationship.
A cousin of Judge Roy Moore?

A cousin of Judge Roy Moore?

 
 He did the same thing didn't he a few years back. Why is it the so many evangelicals and rightwing politicians are so mean-spirited? Why do they think they have all the "right" answers? It is like George Bush and Iraq. Stubborn, arrogant and stupid.

I checked out the name of that judge on Google News. Interestingly, the mainstream news agencies (Reuters, etc.) just said the mother was denied custody. Only in the gay sites was it mentioned that the judge asked her to hook up with a fellow. That may have been creative license.
 
 Make no mistake, I think the judgment is deplorable and unjust. Just wanted to clarify.

Better to be AAish than reprobate extremist hatemongers of anything moral and right. emoticon_rolleyes

 
 Arch, do you really think that there are some of us posting here that hate "anything that is moral and right"?
 
 Is everyone who disagrees with you a "reprobate extremist hatemonger"?
 
 Please clarify.

I'm glad that we saved the world from another homosexual being raised... oh wait, straight people can raise homos too. emoticon_xgood 
 
 I love how this judge doesn't even truly consider what's best for the child. Being with a gay parent is no more or less risky than being with a straight parent. Look at what the two parents have to offer, check the background (not their sexuality) and see who the child wants to be with. Man, what would the judge do if the father was gay too... lol... "Your children will now be but up for adoption. I will save them from you loving parents."
